section_about.description: Whether you're looking for a work desk, private office or a whole floor, cirCO is providing a collaborative workspace that fuels your business growth.

section_intro.title: Sign up a business account and get up to $450 today!
section_intro.description: Happy employees at a discount! Sign up for WorkNow for Business today and get vouchers worth up to $450!

section_features.mobile-desc: Find workspaces, view real time occupancy, book rooms and desks, check in and out -- all via the app.
section_features.automatic-desc: Register your mobile automatically, or manually via a private code
section_features.flexible-desc: Choose to pay personally or using the WorkNow for Business Account during each checkout.

section_realtime.title: WorkNow for Business Dashboard & Usage Management Portal
section_realtime.description: Get visibility on HQ desk usage savings, commute time saved, most popular neighborhoods, define and generate reports on how employees are using WorkNow to work from anywhere.

section_signup.title: Ready to get started?
section_signup.pay-note: Our consultant will contact you shortly.

verify_account.title: Welcome
verify_account.step: Just 2 steps and your business account will be active rightaway.
verify_account.complete: Now lets complete business information for your account
verify_account.last: Wonderful! Finally, create a password to secure your account.
